snippet: The U.S. Open closed its new, $150 million retractable roof atop Arthur Ashe Stadium during a match for the first time Wednesday night....
lead_paragraph: The U.S. Open closed its new, $150 million retractable roof atop Arthur Ashe Stadium during a match for the first time Wednesday night.

headline.print_headline: Open and Shut! US Open Closes Roof for 1st Time During Match
headline.main: Open and Shut! US Open Closes Roof for 1st Time During Match
